About.head: Thanks for coming this far to know us
About.paragraph: We are the group of Five (babu, madhu, jagan, inderajith, aswanth) without them this app is the long dream. We always believed no matter what there should be access to quality content and to access those content it should be affordable as well. To aid this dream our teachers (subratha ,nandhini ,tamil selvan) came forward for this cause and helped usthroughtout our journey in making this CaCO2 app what you see right now. Our biggest happiness happens only when we make our students get their dreams achieved.
About.foot: our dream is to make your dreams get achieved
